DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness AcrySof® IQ ReSTOR® +3.0 D Multifocal Toric IOL Models SND1T3 , SND1T4 , SND1T5 , SND1T6 implant replace natural lens Japanese cataract patient .
DOC.brief_title: AcrySof® IQ ReSTOR® +3.0 D Multifocal Toric Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) Clinical Study Japan
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant complete preoperative examination eye , implantation IOL operative visit eye , 8 postoperative visit : Day 1-2 , Day 7-14 , Day 30-60 implantation , Day 120-180 Day 330-420 second eye implantation . The second implantation occur within 30 day first.The primary eye define eye high astigmatism , eye define secondary eye . If eye level astigmatism , first implant eye set primary eye .
DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent ; Diagnosed bilateral cataract ; Planned cataract removal phacoemulsification ; Potential postoperative visual acuity 0.6 decimal good eye ; Preoperative astigmatism ≥ 0.75 diopter ; Clear intraocular medium cataract study eye ; Calculated lens power astigmatism within available range ; Pupil size great equal 6 mm dilation ; Able undergo second eye surgery within 30 day first eye surgery ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Irregular corneal aberration demonstrate corneal topography ; Any inflammation edema ( swell ) cornea ; Diagnosed degenerative visual disorder predict cause future acuity loss level bad 0.6 decimal ; Diabetic retinopathy ; Previous refractive surgery , retinal detachment , corneal transplant ; Glaucoma ; Pregnant , nursing , suspect pregnant ; Currently participate another investigational drug device study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
